summary: GallerySection updates add explicit JPEG asset paths and introduce client-side image error tracking, but the diff does not conclusively show that all 9 images reference the required deployable "/assets/gallery/...jpeg" paths or that the corresponding JPEG files are present in the frontend public assets directory. Deployment/redeploy completion cannot be verified from code diffs alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Gallery section references the exact, deployable static asset paths for the 9 uploaded JPEG photos (paths like "/assets/gallery/...jpeg") and that those files are present under the frontend public assets directory used by the current code.
missing_requirements.reason: Only 6 of the 9 images use the "/assets/gallery/...jpeg" prefix; 3 images use "/assets/...jpeg" instead. The diff also does not show any added/moved static JPEG files under the public assets directory, so file presence cannot be confirmed from the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the production build and redeploy so the updated gallery is live.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes documentation updates but provides no evidence of an actual production build artifact or deployment action/result; this cannot be confirmed from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced internal documentation and metadata files not explicitly requested (frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on fixing gallery image paths, adding fallback UI, and redeploying; these ancillary summary/state file updates are not part of the stated requirements.
